title: Pink Amethyst and Polki Diamond Vanki Stud Earrings
features: Inspired by the traditional Vanki armlet design, these stud earrings feature a central pear-shaped Pink Amethyst accented with meticulously placed Polki diamonds. The gold framework showcases delicate filigree details, giving it an antique charm with a modern touch. The settings are handcrafted for maximum gemstone visibility and brilliance.
colors: and Sparkling White/Clear from the Polki Diamonds
occasions: and special celebrations. They also complement contemporary outfits for a sophisticated evening look.
description: A unique fusion of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The use of Polki diamonds and Pink Amethyst offers a distinctive look. Expertly crafted in Hyderabad with meticulous attention to detail. A statement piece that combines heritage and contemporary elegance.
